833630.name: Starlight City
833630.description:
Starlight City is an aesthetically dreamy 90s platformer in body and soul! Loud, bright, and colorful, this neon infused visual style coupled with hand pleasing fluid platformer game-feel hits all the right buttons for anyone with that retro itch. Inspiration has been taken from many classic game and anime titles, which you'll feel a bit of in your subconscious through every low poly model your eyes salivate over.

FEATURES
  • MASTER CLASS PLATFORMING
  • MISSION BASED CAMPAIGN
  • HAND CRAFTED WORLDS
  • SATISFYING COLLECTABLES
  • A FULLY FLEDGED LEVEL EDITOR

In Starlight City, you'll play as Pepper: an adorably peppy girl who is ready to save the day! Pepper's life is turned upside-down as her immaculate city is plunged into darkness and chaos. When she crosses to the other side, she discovers a few new personalities within herself. These personalities are:

  • PEPPER - The one true amalgamation of all that IS the Pepper.
  • COWGIRL - A gun slinging rope swinging sharpshooter!
  • HAMMERGIRL - Physically the toughest and strongest of the bunch, wielding a massive hammer!
  • SKATERGIRL - The speedy trickster!

Starlight City is currently under heavy development. Wishlist to stay informed on when it's released!
